Top destinations

Croatia

With over 1000 beautiful islands scattered along the coast, crystal clear Adriatic water and some of the most beautiful beaches in the Mediterranean, it’s no wonder a sailing holiday in Croatia is one of our most popular boat rental.

Boat rentals in Croatia: Pula Trogir Zadar Dubrovnik Split

Spain

With over 1000 beautiful islands scattered along the coast, crystal clear Adriatic water and some of the most beautiful beaches in the Mediterranean, it’s no wonder a sailing holiday in Spain is one of our most popular boat rental.

Boat rentals in Spain: Andalusia Balearic Islands Basque Country Canary Islands Catalunya Galicia Murcia Valencia

Greece

With over 1000 beautiful islands scattered along the coast, crystal clear Adriatic water and some of the most beautiful beaches in the Mediterranean, it’s no wonder a sailing holiday in Greece is one of our most popular boat rental.

Boat rentals in Greece: Cyclades North Ionian Sporades Crete Chalkidiki

Italy

With over 1000 beautiful islands scattered along the coast, crystal clear Adriatic water and some of the most beautiful beaches in the Mediterranean, it’s no wonder a sailing holiday in Italy is one of our most popular boat rental.

France

With over 1000 beautiful islands scattered along the coast, crystal clear Adriatic water and some of the most beautiful beaches in the Mediterranean, it’s no wonder a sailing holiday in France is one of our most popular boat rental.

Boat rentals in France: Aquitaine Corsica Guadeloupe Languedoc-Roussillon Martinique Normandy Poitou-Charentes
